name: Knife Rush Fruit: 2019
description:
Double Axe is a high addictive quick tapping 3d knife games! Aim to hit Sushi with your quick reflex
and do not make any mistakes! The more Sushi you dash, the harder it becomes. Flip the knives, throw them out,
splash the target and build your own collection of legendary knives!
Be careful and do not miss hitting the Sushi. Time your actions, target carefully and become the knife master!
How to Play:
- Select your Axe
- Tap to throw Axe
- Slice Sushi with your Axe
- Earn point
